abstract: Kazakhstan says it will soon require public servants to leave smartphones at door of government buildings; policy is meant to stop leaks of confidential information through WhatsApp mobile application.

headline.print_headline: Kazakhstan: Leaked Memo Reveals Plan to Stop Leaks
headline.main: Kazakhstan: Leaked Memo Reveals Plan to Stop Leaks

keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
keywords.name: glocations

snippet: Kazakh officials will have to leave their smartphones at the door of government buildings beginning in line with a new policy aimed at preventing leaks of confidential documents.
lead_paragraph: Kazakh officials will have to leave their smartphones at the door of government buildings beginning in line with a new policy aimed at preventing leaks of confidential documents.
